code: import{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import API_BASE_URL from"../config";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Register(){const[name,setName]=useState("");const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");function registerUser(){axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/register"),{name,email,password}).then(res=>{if(res.data.message==="registered"){alert("Registration Successful");window.location="/login";}else if(res.data.message==="email_exists"){alert("Email Already Registered");}}).catch(err=>console.log(err));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-5",style:{maxWidth:"400px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"User Registration"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"form-control mt-3",placeholder:"Name",onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"form-control mt-3",placeholder:"Email",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",className:"form-control mt-3",placeholder:"Password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success mt-3 w-100",onClick:registerUser,children:"Register"})]});}
